summary.publishing_body: IEEE Xplore (in cooperation with IEEE Computer Society)
program_committee: Mohammad Alshayeb, King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals
William J. Bowman, University of British Columbia
Eduardo Fernandes, University of Southern Denmark
Javier Luis Cánovas Izquierdo, Universitat Oberta de Catalunya
Ranjit Jhala, University of California, San Diego
Murali Krishna Ramanathan, Amazon Web Services
Francis Palma, University of New Brunswick
G. Gary Tan, Pennsylvania State University
publications_criteria: Novelty: New ideas and results within the context of previous research.
Importance: Contributions to the advancement of knowledge.
Evidence: Sufficient support for claims (proofs, experimental results, etc.).
Clarity: Clear presentation of contributions, methodology, and results.
summary.review_process: Double-blind review by three PC members.

submission_guidelines.format: PDF, printable in black and white, US Letter size.
submission_guidelines.length: 6 to 20 pages including references and appendices.
